ctx: induction l as [| x xs IH].

original: intros l a H. induction l as [| x xs IH]. - simpl. intro H. contradiction. - simpl. intros [H1 | H2]. + rewrite H1. apply in_eq. + apply IH in H2. apply in_cons. apply H2.
